meanings.definition: To have a stronger or more pleasant smell than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: The flowers in the garden outsmell the ones in the park.
meanings.sent2: Her perfume always outsmells everyone else's in the room.
meanings.sent3: The bakery's fresh bread outsmells the nearby pizza place.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the coffee outsmelled the scent of the morning dew.
meanings.sent5: The sweet fragrance of the roses outsmelled all other flowers.

meanings.definition: To emit a stronger or more pleasant smell than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: The bakery always outsmells the street with its delicious scents.
meanings.sent2: The fresh laundry outsmells the musty old closet.
meanings.sent3: The bakery's oven outsmells the entire neighborhood with its tempting aromas.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden outsmell the air with their sweet perfume.
meanings.sent5: The scented candle outsmells any air freshener on the market.
